ARABIC: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so decide on your scheme and then arrive together in force. He who gains the upper hand today will definitely prosper.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So prepare your strategy and come forward. He alone shall win today who is superior."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So muster all your stratagem and come forth in a row. Whoever prevails today shall triumph."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Bring together your devices and come forward in ranks; the winner will, certainly, have great happiness".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore strengthen your scheme, and come forth in rows; indeed whoever dominates this day has succeeded.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So devise your plot, and then assemble in line. And whoever overcomes this day will be indeed successful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore settle your plan, then come standing in ranks and he will prosper indeed this day who overcomes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So gather your guile; then come in battle-line. Whoever today gains the upper hand shall surely prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So arrange your plan, and come in battle line. Whoso is uppermost this day will be indeed successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Therefore, decide upon your plan and then come forward in ranks. Whoever gains the upper hand today shall surely triumph."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore devise your stratagem, and then come in a row; and prospered to-day is he who overcometh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So summon up your ingenuity, then come in ranks. Today he who has the upper hand will be felicitous!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore concert your plan, and then assemble in (serried) ranks: He wins (all along) today who gains the upper hand."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So devise your plot, and then assemble in line. And whoever overcomes this day will be indeed successful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Gather your guile and then lineup a rank those who gain the upper hand today shall indeed prosper'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So settle your plan, and come as one front. Today, whoever gains the upper hand will succeed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:64] So summon up your guile, in the way of sorcery (read fa’jma‘ū, from [the first form] jama‘a, meaning ‘he gathered’, or read fa-ajmi‘ū, from [the fourth form] ajma‘a, meaning ‘he resolved [to do something]’) and come in battle-line (saffan, a circumstantial qualifier, meaning ‘standing in rows’). For truly he who is uppermost, [he who] triumphs, this day shall be the victor!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So arrange your plan) your scheming, magic and knowledge, (and come in battle line) all together. (Whoso is uppermost) victorious (this day will be indeed successful).
